The supported options for 'Switch to Storage Connection' are either 'Using storage box's SIMDB' or 'Using storage box's simulated CIMOM', there is no support for live CIMOM for storage subsystems
Reopen this bug due to receiving the same error message with the option 'Using storage box's simulated CIMOM' when simulating switch to storage connection.

This defect is due to the new DS-ICAT CIMOM v5.2 reporting null values for FCPort.PortNumber.

It is fixed in the latest SANSimulator code.
